heroSubtitle: Protect your users with enterprise-grade authentication that's easy to implement and a pleasure to use.
featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for secure, user-friendly authentication
secureAuthDesc: Industry-standard security protocols to protect user data and prevent breaches.
twoFactorDesc: Add an extra layer of security with email, SMS, or app-based verification.
passwordlessDesc: Enable modern authentication without the hassle of passwords.
biometricAuthDesc: Support for fingerprint, face ID, and other biometric authentication methods.
step1Desc: Sign up for Krypt and configure your authentication settings.
step2Desc: Add our lightweight SDK to your application with just a few lines of code.
step3Desc: Launch with confidence knowing your users are protected.
testimonialsSubtitle: Trusted by thousands of developers worldwide
testimonial1Text: Krypt has simplified our authentication process while significantly improving security. Our development team loves how easy it was to integrate.
testimonial2Text: The two-factor authentication feature saved us months of development time. Our users feel safer and we've seen higher retention rates.
testimonial3Text: After switching to Krypt, account security incidents dropped by 90%. Customer support has been exceptional throughout our journey.
pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that works for you
ctaText: Join thousands of developers who trust Krypt for their authentication needs.

startWithKrypt: Get started with Krypt authentication today - it's free and only takes a minute to set up.
secureUserFriendly: Everything you need for secure, user-friendly authentication
securityProtocols: Industry-standard security protocols to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.
emailVerification: Add an extra layer of security with email verification codes.
passwordResetProcess: Simple and secure password reset process when users forget their credentials.
authenticationSteps: Simple steps to get started with our authentication system
createAccountDesc: Sign up for Krypt and set up your first authentication profile.
enableTwoFactorDesc: Add email verification for an extra layer of security.
secureLoginDesc: Log in securely with your credentials and verification code.
userSayDesc: Hear from people who are using our authentication service
testimonial1: Setting up Krypt authentication was incredibly easy. The two-factor authentication gives me peace of mind about my data security.
testimonial2: The password reset feature saved me when I forgot my login details. Quick email verification and I was back in within minutes.
testimonial3: I love the clean interface and how straightforward the authentication process is. It's simple but extremely secure.
faqDesc: Everything you need to know about our authentication service
faqQuestion1: How secure is your authentication service?
faqAnswer1: Our authentication service uses industry-standard security protocols like hashed passwords and secure email verification. All data is encrypted and we follow best practices for web security.
faqQuestion2: What if I forget my password?
faqAnswer2: Don't worry! You can easily reset your password through our password recovery feature. We'll send a secure link to your registered email address to create a new password.
faqAnswer3: After entering your password, we'll send a verification code to your email. You'll need to enter this code to complete the login process, adding an extra layer of security to your account.
faqQuestion4: Can I change my email address?
faqAnswer4: Yes, you can update your email address in your account settings. We'll send a verification link to your new email to confirm the change.
faqAnswer5: Absolutely. We only collect the minimal information needed for authentication. Your data is encrypted and we never share your personal information with third parties.
securityStandard: Industry-standard security for a unique experience
simpleSecure: Simple, secure, and easy-to-use authentication that protects users and their data.
